pr_title: BLUEBUTTON-1593 Refactor to simplify paging parameters

timeline.message:
Refactor to simplify paging parameters

- Refactor of createPageLink() URL parameter building.

- Remove method params not related to paging.

- Retain original params from RequestDetails.

timeline.bodyText: It looks like these can be removed, I don't see them being used anywhere.
timeline.author: whytheplatypus

replies.bodyText: Good catch. Will verify and remove them.
replies.author: dtisza1

timeline.bodyText:
Small suggestion. You can make this read simpler by removing...
Map<String, String> param = new HashMap<>(requestDetails...
timeline.author: RickHawesUSDS

timeline.bodyText: Now that we are really improving this method. I'm wondering if we could use UriBuilder instead of StringBuilder here.
timeline.author: RickHawesUSDS

replies.bodyText: That sounds interesting. Will check that out :-)
replies.author: dtisza1

replies.bodyText: @RickHawesUSDS I changed it to use the URIBuilder. This worked out well. I'll update how the links now look in the change details.  TY!
replies.author: dtisza1

timeline.message: Refactor HashMap to be more readable
